        config - Configuration for this test run
        iType - IInterface.Type of interface to run

      • closeWindow

        public void closeWindow()
                 throws Exception

        Throws:
        Exception - not thrown

      • focusWindow

        public void focusWindow(int index)
                 throws Exception
        Focus a browser window by its index if it is not the current index.

        The order of browser windows is somewhat arbitrary and not guaranteed, although window creation time ordering seems to be the most common.

        Parameters:
        index - the window index
        Throws:
        Exception - if the specified window index is out of range

      • focusWindow

        public void focusWindow(String titleOrUrl)
                 throws Exception
        Focus a browser window by its window title or URL if it does not match the current title or URL.

        If more than one window has the same title or URL, the first encountered is the one that is focused.

        Parameters:
        titleOrUrl - the exact window title or URL to be matched
        Throws:
        Exception - if the specified window cannot be found

      • forward

        public void forward()
             throws Exception
        Navigates the interface forward. If forward is undefined, it does nothing.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getWindowsString

        public String getWindowsString()
        Returns a string with the contents of the windows data structure.
        Returns:
        A string representation of all focused windows, with chronological index of focus and handle

      • widget

        public VControl widget(VHook.Strategy hookStrategy,
              String hookString)
                throws Exception
        Encompasses a widget from the current page in order to perform an action on it. Providing this as a more aptly named alternative to getControl as the 'thing' encompassed by this is not necessarily a 'control' and merely referencing it does nothing; an action must be performed off of it, hence not named 'getWidget'.
        Parameters:
        hookStrategy - method to use to search for the widget
        hookString - string to find using the specified strategy
        Throws:
        Exception - not thrown

      • widget

        public VControl widget(VHook hook)
                throws Exception
        Encompasses a widget from the current page in order to perform an action on it. Providing this as a more aptly named alternative to getControl as the 'thing' encompassed by this is not necessarily a 'control' and merely referencing it does nothing; an action must be performed off of it, hence not named 'getWidget'.
        Parameters:
        hook - VHook method to use to search for the widget
        Throws:
        Exception - not thrown
